name: Demon Sitter
description:
In this fast-paced arcade card game, you will be put in the shoes of a babysitter who must deal with the problems of whiny children to make them go to sleep. There is also a crafting mechanic that allows you to mix two items and produce a third item that can be used to pacify the children. Oh, did I mention that the children are literal demons? No? HAHA that's right folks, if you waste too much time, these children will transform into demons and wreak havoc!

Can you handle the pressure?

No text was used in this game as a requirement by the Mini 68 Game Jam.

Ironic how the theme was sleep, but neither of us got any sleep :)
